ygData.subject: Extended Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow...it is so great to see this list really taking off :) Just a brief intro...I m a 23 year old gay male also living in Toronto (waves to his neighbour
ygData.messageBody:
Wow...it is so great to see this list really taking off :)

Just a brief intro...I'm a 23 year old gay male also living in Toronto (waves to his neighbour Christina *grin*)
and am currently enrolled in a Computer Programming degree.

I have been playing EQ quite awhile now, yet usually only get my chars to level 10 or so before trying yet another class!
(Hence my Supernewbie status *grin*)
I think this list is a great idea as it is good to know I am not the only non-hetero addicted to this game.

I am planning on starting another level 1...probably on the new server, maybe if anyone is interested they might give me a shout...
but probably many of you are quite attached to your current personas. *smile*

I am looking forward to seeing many more posts and thanks again Christina for getting the ball rolling!

Todd :)
